Description:
Gone Home - Indie first-person adventure game, which the unfolding events in June 1995. The main character, returning from abroad, finds the house empty and the parent is trying to figure out what happened during her absence. Developers are trying to immerse the player into the atmosphere of the 90's, paying attention to detail: recreate the life characteristic of the houses of the time, used as soundtrack music of female punk rock bands: Heavens to Betsy, Bratmobile.
